Title: Visits, Conjugal and Otherwise
Plot: With Schibetta and the prison brass in a race to uncover Ortolani's killer (for very different reasons), we see how inmates react to visits from both their wives and, in one case, family members who are also in prison.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Susan Floyd, Tomas Milian, Tim McAdams, Goodfella Mike G., Jose Ramon Rosario, Esther Swan, Skipp Sudduth, Douglas Crosby, O.L. Duke, Steve Ryan, Tony Musante, Tim Quill
